text: @realDonaldTrump it would help @potus and rubber stamp @vp... that either of you knew anything about history... otherwise you would be fighting for Americans, for healthcare, for UI insurance, for understanding that your failures has COVID-19 coming back stronger than before.  STFU worthless.
